name: backbone
summary: Give your JS App some Backbone with Models, Views, Collections, and Events.
description: Backbone.js gives structure to your serious JavaScript web applications by supplying models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing API over a RESTful JSON interface.
author: Jeremy Ashkenas <jeremy@documentcloud.org>
